meals.description: Thin crusted neapolitan pizza with marinara sauce

meals.name: Cheeseburger
meals.description: 120g beef patty with cheddar cheese, pickles and brioche bun

meals.name: Pad Thai
meals.description: Stir fried rice noodes with veggies, eggs and authentic sauce

meals.name: Shoyu Ramen
meals.description: Japanese noodle soup, with a combination of a rich flavoured broth, one of a variety of types of noodle and a selection of meats or vegetables, often topped with a boiled egg.

meals.name: Katsu Curry
meals.description: Japanese dish consisting of a pork cutlet (tonkatsu) served with a portion of Japanese rice and curry

meals.name: Pierogi
meals.description: Dumplings filled with minced beef. Served with carmelised onion.

meals.name: Beef Udon
meals.description: thick Japanese noodles made of wheat flour, served with thinly sliced beef and stir fried veggies.

meals.name: Butter Chicken
meals.description: Grilled chicken is simmered in a spicy, aromatic, buttery and creamy tomato gravy.

meals.description: Thin crusted neapolitan pizza with marinara sauce and mushrooms
